instructions: Pour 1/2 shot of 151 proof rum and 1/2 shot of Wild Turkey into a shot glass, then shoot.
Pour equal parts Kahlua, Baileys, and Frangelico into a shot glass and serve.

name: 110 in the shade
instructions: Pour 1.5 oz of tequila into a beer glass, then fill with 16 oz of lager.

name: 151 Florida Bushwacker
instructions: Blend 1/2 oz Malibu rum, 1/2 oz light rum, 1/2 oz 151 proof rum, 1 oz dark crème de cacao, 1 oz Cointreau, 3 oz milk, 1 oz coconut liqueur, and 1 cup vanilla ice cream until smooth. Pour into a beer mug.

name: 155 Belmont
instructions: Blend 1 shot of dark rum, 2 shots of light rum, 1 shot of vodka, and 1 shot of orange juice with ice, then pour into a white wine glass.

name: 1800 Coco Piñarita
instructions: Combine 1 part 1800 Coconut Tequila, 2 parts Dole Pineapple Juice, and 1 part Tres Agaves Organic Margarita Mix with ice in a shaker, then strain into a margarita glass. Garnish with fresh pineapple, coconut, or lime if desired.

name: 24k nightmare
instructions: Combine Goldschlager, Jägermeister, Rumple Minze, and 151 proof rum in a shaker with ice, then strain into a shot glass.

name: 3 Wise Men
instructions: Pour 1/3 oz each of Jack Daniels, Johnnie Walker, and Jim Beam into a Collins glass, then slam it back.

name: 3-Mile Long Island Iced Tea
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice, then add gin, light rum, tequila, triple sec, and vodka. Pour in cola to fill 2/3 of the glass, followed by sweet and sour to top off. Add a dash of bitters and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: 410 Gone
instructions: Combine 2-3 oz of peach vodka with Coca-Cola in a Collins glass filled with ice and stir gently.
Fill a Collins glass with crushed ice, then add 2 1/2 oz of vanilla vodka and a splash of Grand Marnier. Top off with orange juice.

name: 501 Blue
instructions: Combine equal parts Blue Curacao, blueberry schnapps, vodka, and sour mix in a Collins glass filled with ice, then top with 7-Up.

name: 57 Chevy with a White License Plate
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add 1 oz of white creme de cacao and 1 oz of vodka; stir gently to combine.

name: 69 Special
instructions: In a Collins glass filled with ice, combine 2 oz gin, 4 oz 7-Up, and 0.75 oz lemon juice; stir gently to mix. Adjust sweetness by adding more 7-Up if desired.

name: 747 Drink
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add vodka, lime juice, and cranberry juice. Top with Sprite and stir gently.

name: 9 1/2 Weeks
instructions: Combine 2 oz Absolut Citron, 1/2 oz Orange Curacao, 1 splash of Strawberry liqueur, and 1 oz Orange juice in a shaker with ice. Chill, then fine strain into a cocktail glass.

name: A. J.
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Applejack and 1 oz grapefruit juice with ice, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: A1
instructions: Combine 1 3/4 shots of gin, 1 shot of Grand Marnier, 1/4 shot of lemon juice, and 1/8 shot of grenadine in a cocktail shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Aam Panna
instructions: Blend unripe green mango with sugar, cardamom, fresh mint, and black salt until smooth. Serve chilled for a refreshing drink.

name: Aamras
instructions: Blend kesar mangoes until smooth, then mix in sugar, cardamom powder, dry ginger powder, and saffron strands. If desired, stir in milk for a creamier texture before serving.

name: ABC
instructions: Layer Amaretto, then Baileys Irish Cream, and finally Cognac in a shot glass.

name: Abilene
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then combine dark rum, peach nectar, and orange juice. Stir well to mix.

name: Acapulco
instructions: Shake light rum, triple sec, lime juice, sugar, and egg white with ice, then strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

name: Ace
instructions: Combine 2 shots of gin, 1/2 shot of grenadine, 1/2 shot of heavy cream, 1/2 shot of milk, and 1/2 fresh egg white in a shaker with ice, then fine strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: ACID
instructions: Layer 1 oz of 151 proof rum, then 1 oz of Wild Turkey in a shot glass, and serve with a Coke or Dr Pepper chaser.

name: Across the Pacific
instructions: Combine blended aged rum, Jamaican rum, Averna Amaro, lime juice, and orgeat syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Adam
instructions: Combine 2 oz dark rum, 1 oz lemon juice, and 1 tsp grenadine in a shaker with ice, shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Addington
instructions: Combine 2 shots of sweet vermouth and 1 shot of dry vermouth in a shaker, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass and top with soda water.

name: Addison
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 shots of gin and 1 1/2 shots of vermouth, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Adios Motherfucker (AMF)
instructions: Combine equal parts vodka, rum, gin, tequila, and sweet and sour mix in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice, top with Sprite, and add a splash of Blue Curaçao for color.

name: Adonis
instructions: Combine sweet vermouth and fino sherry in a mixing glass with orange bitters and ice, then stir until chilled. Fine strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with a twist of orange zest.

name: Adult Hot Chocolate

ingredients.name: Garnish: chocolate sprinkles or shaved chocolate

instructions: Combine peppermint schnapps and hot chocolate in a mug, then top with whipped cream and sprinkle with chocolate sprinkles or shaved chocolate.
garnish: ​whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles or shaved chocolate

name: Affair
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then pour in the strawberry schnapps, orange juice, and cranberry juice. Top with club soda and serve.

name: Affinity
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Scotch, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 1 oz dry vermouth, and 2 dashes of orange bitters in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Affogato
instructions: Scoop gelato into a bowl and pour hot espresso over it.

name: Afterglow
instructions: Combine 1 part grenadine with 4 parts orange juice and 4 parts pineapple juice, then pour over ice in a highball glass.

name: Agua de bandindo
instructions: Combine lemon flavored corote, strawberry juice powder, and frozen strawberry juice in a blender until smooth. Serve immediately in a chilled glass.

name: Agua de valencia
instructions: Combine fresh-squeezed Valencia orange juice, gin, vodka, and sugar in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Strain into a glass and top with cava.

name: Aguapanela
instructions: Dissolve panela in water, then add freshly squeezed lemon juice. Pour over ice in a glass and stir gently.

name: Airmail
instructions: Combine lime juice, honey syrup, and aged rum in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled flute and top with champagne.

name: Ajoblanco
instructions: Blend blanched Marcona almonds, white bread, garlic, sherry vinegar, apple, salt, cold water, and extra virgin olive oil until smooth. Serve chilled, garnished with green grapes.

name: Alexander
instructions: Combine gin, white creme de cacao, and light cream with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Algonquin
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz blended whiskey, 1 oz dry vermouth, and 1 oz pineapple juice with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Alien Brain Hemorrhage
instructions: Layer peach schnapps, then Bailey’s Irish cream, followed by blue curaçao, and finish with a drizzle of grenadine in a shot glass.

name: Allegheny
instructions: Shake dry vermouth, bourbon, blackberry brandy, and lemon juice with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Almeria
instructions: Combine 2 oz dark rum, 1 oz Kahlua, and 1 egg white in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Almond Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend soaked deskinned almonds, chopped bananas, chilled cow's milk, vanilla essence, and deseeded dates until smooth.

name: Amaretto Sour
instructions: Combine Amaretto liqueur, lemon juice, sugar syrup, Angostura bitters, and egg white in a shaker with ice, then shake vigorously. Fine strain into a chilled glass, garnish with a lemon twist and cherries.

name: Amarula Thai Tea
instructions: Brew Thai tea and let it cool, then combine with Amarula Cream Liqueur in a glass. Top with frothed fat-free milk for a creamy finish.

name: American Trilogy
instructions: In a mixing glass, combine rye whiskey, applejack, brown sugar, and orange bitters with ice. Stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Americano
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine 3 cl of Campari and 3 cl of Vermouth, then top with a splash of soda water. Garnish with half an orange slice.

name: Amritulya Chai
instructions: Brew Assam tea leaves in water, then strain into a pot. Add sugar and crushed elaichi, stirring until dissolved. Incorporate milk and heat gently, serving warm.

name: Angel Face
instructions: Combine gin, apricot brandy, and Calvados with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Angevine Soup
instructions: Combine Crémant de Loire, Cointreau, lime juice, and sugar cane syrup in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Apello
instructions: Combine 4 cl orange juice, 3 cl grapefruit juice, and 1 cl apple juice in a glass with ice, then stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Aperol Spritz

ingredients.name: Sliced orange or lemon for garnish

instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice, then add equal parts Prosecco and Aperol, followed by a splash of club soda. Stir gently and garnish with a slice of orange or lemon.

name: Apertass
instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine equal parts Cedrata Tassoni Soda and Aperol, then stir gently. Garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Apple Cider Margarita

ingredients.name: Cointreau or other orange flavored liqueur

instructions: Combine apple cider, silver tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, maple syrup, sugar, and a pinch of cinnamon in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Apple Cider Mimosa
instructions: In a glass, combine equal parts apple cider and brut champagne, then add a splash of brandy. Rim the glass with a mixture of granulated sugar and cinnamon, and garnish with a thin apple slice.

name: Apple Cider Mules
instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine vodka, ginger beer, and sparkling cider. Stir gently and garnish with sliced apple and a cinnamon stick.

name: Apple Jack
instructions: Combine Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 and apple juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a slice of apple.

name: Apple Liqueur
instructions: Combine apples, ethyl alcohol, water, and sugar in a container. Allow the mixture to steep for several days, then strain to obtain a smooth liqueur.

name: Apple Orchard Punch
instructions: Combine chilled apple juice, frozen cranberry juice concentrate, orange juice, and diced apple in a pitcher, then top with ginger ale and stir gently to mix. Serve in a glass over ice.

name: Apple Pie Cocktail
instructions: In a shaker, combine vanilla-flavored vodka, cinnamon whiskey, lemon juice, and cardamom bitters with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass, then top with chilled sparkling apple cider.

name: Applecar
instructions: Combine 1 oz Applejack, 1 oz Triple sec, and 1 oz Lemon juice with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Appletini
instructions: Combine vodka, green apple schnapps, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

name: April Rain Cocktail

name: Aqueduct
instructions: Combine vodka, Cointreau, apricot liqueur, and lime juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Argentinian Mate
instructions: Steep yerba mate in hot water for a few minutes, then strain into a cup.

name: Artillery
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz gin, 1 1/2 tsp sweet vermouth, and 2 dashes of bitters with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Astronaut
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice, then add gin, lemon juice, and lemon soda, stirring gently. Drizzle grenadine over the top and garnish with a yellow wine gum.

name: AT&T
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in 1 oz of vodka and 1 oz of gin, then top with 4 oz of tonic water and stir gently.

instructions: Combine 1 oz Applejack, 1 oz Triple sec, and 1 oz Lemon juice with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass.

instructions: Combine vodka, green apple schnapps, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

name: April Rain Cocktail
instructions: Combine vodka, freshly squeezed lime juice, and dry vermouth in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with a twist of lime peel.

name: Aqueduct
instructions: Combine vodka, Cointreau, apricot liqueur, and lime juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Argentinian Mate
instructions: Steep yerba mate in hot water for a few minutes, then strain into a cup.

name: Artillery
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz gin, 1 1/2 tsp sweet vermouth, and 2 dashes of bitters with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Astronaut
instructions: Fill a glass with crushed ice, then add gin, lemon juice, and lemon soda, stirring gently. Drizzle grenadine over the top and garnish with a yellow wine gum.

name: AT&T
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in 1 oz of vodka and 1 oz of gin, then top with 4 oz of tonic water and stir gently.

name: Avalanche
instructions: Combine 1 shot of Crown Royal and 1 shot of Kahlua in a shaker with ice, shake well, then strain into a highball glass filled with cream.

name: Avalon

name: Aviation
instructions: Combine gin, cherry liqueur, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then fine strain into a chilled martini glass.

instructions: Blend yoghurt with cold water and a pinch of salt until smooth and creamy, then serve chilled.

name: B-52
instructions: Layer Kahlua, then Baileys Irish Cream, and finally Grand Marnier in a shot glass. Serve with a stirrer.

instructions: Layer Kahlua, then Sambuca, and finally Grand Marnier in a shot glass.

name: B52
instructions: Layer 2 cl of coffee liqueur, then 2 cl of cream liqueur, and top with 2 cl of triple sec in a shot glass. Flame the triple sec and serve immediately with a straw on the side.

name: Baby Eskimo
instructions: Let the ice cream soften for about 10 minutes, then combine Kahlua and milk in a Collins glass, adding the ice cream on top. Stir gently with a chopstick, butter knife, or spoon, and enjoy immediately.

name: Baby Guinness
instructions: Layer coffee flavored liqueur, then Irish cream liqueur in a shot glass.

name: Bacardi
instructions: Combine 4.5 cl white rum, 2 cl lime juice, and 1 cl syrup with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Bacardi Cocktail
instructions: Combine Bacardi rum, lime juice, and grenadine syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bael Panna (Woodapple Juice)
instructions: Blend the medium-sized bael with water until smooth, then strain into a bowl. Mix in powdered jaggery, rock salt, and roasted cumin seeds until well combined. Serve chilled or over ice.

name: Bahama Mama
instructions: Combine 3 parts rum, 1 part dark rum, 1 part banana liqueur, 1 part grenadine, 2 parts pineapple juice, 2 parts orange juice, and 1 part sweet and sour in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass filled with ice, then top with club soda to taste.

name: Bajan Rum Punch
instructions: Combine lime juice, simple syrup, rum, and water in a shaker with ice, then add a few dashes of Angostura bitters. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Bajigur
instructions: Combine black coffee, coconut milk, brown sugar, and granulated sugar in a pot over low heat, stirring until sugars dissolve. Add pandan leaves and cinnamon, simmer for a few minutes, then strain into a cup and adjust sweetness with Graham to taste.

name: Balmoral
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Scotch, 1/2 oz sweet vermouth, 1/2 oz dry vermouth, and 2 dashes of bitters in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend milk, vanilla extract, white sugar, and ground cinnamon until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Banana with cocoa powder
instructions: Blend ripe bananas with milk until smooth, then stir in cocoa powder to taste. Serve immediately for a creamy, indulgent treat.

name: Bandrek
instructions: In a pot, combine mineral water, refined brown sugar, crushed grilled ginger, rubbed lemongrass stems, salt, and cleaned pandan leaves. Heat gently until sugar dissolves, then serve warm, optionally topped with vanilla sweetened condensed milk.

name: Bandung, Rose Syrup Beverage
instructions: Combine equal parts condensed milk and Roohafza with water in a glass, stirring gently until well mixed. Serve chilled.

name: Bangkok Sunrise
instructions: Combine tequila, orange juice, and lemongrass syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass. Slowly pour grenadine down the side to create a layered effect.

name: Barley Drink

ingredients.name: of pandan leaves - tied into a knot

instructions: Combine pearl barley and water in a pot, add pandan leaves, and simmer until the barley is tender. Strain the mixture, then sweeten with rock sugar and stir in candied wintermelon before serving.

name: Barnamint Bailey's
instructions: Blend Baileys, crème de menthe, milk, and vanilla ice cream with crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass and garnish with crushed Oreo cookies on top.

name: Barracuda
instructions: Shake rum, Galliano, pineapple juice, and a dash of lime juice with ice, then strain into a chilled margarita glass and top with Prosecco.

name: Barraquito
instructions: In a glass, layer coffee, then Licor 43, followed by condensed milk, and top with frothed milk.

name: Basil Kadha
instructions: Muddle basil, lemongrass, and ginger in a pot, then add water and jaggery. Simmer until fragrant, strain into a cup, and serve warm.

name: Basil Smash
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with sugar syrup in a shaker, then add gin and lemon juice. Fill with ice, shake well, and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Basil Smash Pina Colada
instructions: Muddle lime and basil or mint leaves in a shaker, then add white rum, dark rum, pineapple chunks, and canned coconut cream with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bay Breeze
instructions: Combine equal parts cranberry juice and pineapple juice with vodka in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently to mix.

name: Beam me up, Scotchie
instructions: Muddle figs in a shaker, then add Glenfiddich Scotch and vanilla liqueur with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bee's Kiss
instructions: Combine white rum, cream, and honey in a shaker with ice, then shake well and strain into a chilled glass. Grate nutmeg on top for garnish.

name: Bee's Knees
instructions: Combine dry gin, lemon juice, and honey in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Beer Pletok
instructions: Combine ginger, lemongrass, sappan wood, cinnamon, granulated sugar, and a pinch of salt in a pot with boiled water, then simmer for 10 minutes. Strain into a glass over ice and serve.

name: Beergarita
instructions: Combine equal parts tequila, Tattersall Grapefruit Crema, and lime juice in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Strain into a glass and top with light beer.

name: Bellini
instructions: Pour peach puree into a chilled champagne flute, then gently add Prosecco and stir to combine.

name: Bentley
instructions: Combine equal parts applejack and Red Dubonnet in a mixing glass, add a dash of Peychaud's Bitters if desired, then stir with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Beras Kencur
instructions: Blend galangal, rice, tamarind, salt, palm sugar, and water until smooth, then strain into a glass.

name: Berry and Oat Smoothie
instructions: Blend rolled oats, semi-skimmed milk, honey, blackberries, blueberries, and flaxseeds until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Berry Shrub
instructions: Muddle fresh or frozen raspberries with sugar and thyme in a mixing vessel, then add white balsamic vinegar and stir until well combined. Fine strain into a glass and serve.

name: Berrylicious Frozen Sangria Slush

ingredients.name: white sugar, or more to taste

instructions: Blend red wine, crushed ice, frozen blueberries, fresh raspberries, orange-flavored liqueur, orange juice, and white sugar until smooth. Serve immediately in a chilled glass.

name: Beton
instructions: Combine Becherovka and tonic in a glass filled with ice, then squeeze in fresh lemon juice and stir gently.

name: Between the Sheets
instructions: Combine white rum, cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Bible Belt
instructions: Muddle lime wedges in a highball glass, then add Southern Comfort, triple sec, and sour mix. Fill with ice and stir gently.

name: Big Red
instructions: Layer Irish cream, then Goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Bijou
instructions: Combine 1 oz gin, 1 oz sweet vermouth, and 1 oz green chartreuse with a dash of orange bitters in a mixing glass filled with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Bikini Martini
instructions: Combine coconut rum, vodka, pineapple juice, and grenadine syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bitter but Good eh!
instructions: Combine equal parts gin and Campari in a mixing glass with ice, stir until chilled, then strain into a chilled glass. Top with white beer and garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Black Martini
instructions: Combine gin and black sambuca in a mixing glass with ice, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Black Russian
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine 5 cl vodka and 2 cl coffee liqueur, then stir gently.

name: Black Velvet
instructions: Pour equal parts stout beer and sparkling wine or champagne into a glass, allowing them to mix gently.

name: Black Widow
instructions: Combine black vodka or frozen raspberries with cranberry juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Blackberry Thyme Margarita
instructions: Muddle fresh blackberries and thyme in a shaker, then add lime juice, orange zest, silver tequila, and honey if desired; shake with ice and strain into a glass. Top with sparkling water and garnish with a quartered red plum if using.

name: Blackthorn
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz sloe gin and 1 oz sweet vermouth with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Blackthorn Cocktail
instructions: Combine Irish whiskey, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and Angostura bitters in a mixing glass with ice. Stir until well chilled, then rinse a chilled coupe with absinthe and discard excess. Fine strain the mixture into the prepared glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Combine equal parts fresh blood orange juice, cherry liqueur, sweet vermouth, and Scotch in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Blood Orange Champagne Mule
instructions: Muddle mint leaves in a shaker, then add blood orange juice, lime juice, and vodka; shake with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with chilled ginger beer and finish with a splash of chilled champagne.

name: Bloody Eyeball Shot
instructions: In a shot glass, layer coconut rum, then peach schnapps, followed by vodka. Add a drop of red food coloring, then place a lychee filled with jelly on top.

name: Bloody Geisha
instructions: Combine sake, tomato juice, lime juice, Worcestershire sauce, Tabasco sauce, celery salt, ground black pepper, and smoked paprika in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Bloody Kirby
instructions: Muddle a peeled Kirby cucumber slice in a shaker, then add Grey Goose Le Citron vodka, dry vermouth, tomato juice, and a dash of Tabasco sauce. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Bloody Mary
instructions: Combine vodka, tomato juice, and lemon juice in a highball glass filled with ice, then stir gently. Garnish with celery and an optional lemon wedge.

name: Bl** Job Cocktail
instructions: Layer Irish cream, then Amaretto, followed by coffee liqueur in a shot glass, and top with whipped cream.

name: Blue Hawaiian Cocktail
instructions: Blend rum, blue Curacao, pineapple juice, cream of coconut, and crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and a maraschino cherry.

name: Blue Lady
instructions: Combine Blue Curaçao, light rum, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Blue Lagoon
instructions: Combine vodka, blue curaçao, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Blue Monday
instructions: Combine equal parts vodka, Cointreau, and blue curaçao in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with flamed orange zest.

name: Blue Oasis
instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine gin and blue curaçao, then top with soda. Squeeze in lemon wedges for added freshness.

name: Blue Vodka Lemonade

ingredients.name: Blue liquor, (UV Blue Vodka or Blue Curaçao)

instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine equal parts lemonade and blue liquor, adding a drop of blue food coloring if desired. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend together banana, frozen blueberries, orange juice, and wheat germ until smooth. Serve immediately in a chilled glass.

name: Bluebird
instructions: Combine gin, triple sec, blue Curacao, and bitters in a mixing glass with crushed ice and stir well. Fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass, then garnish with a twist of lemon peel and a maraschino cherry.

name: Bob Marley
instructions: Layer 1/2 oz of Midori melon liqueur, then 1/2 oz of Jägermeister, and finally 1/2 oz of Goldschlager in a shot glass.

name: Boba Tea
instructions: Brew black tea bags in hot water, then stir in brown sugar until dissolved. In a glass, add cooked black tapioca pearls, pour the sweetened tea over, and top with cold water.

name: Bobby Burns
instructions: Combine scotch whisky, sweet vermouth, and Benedictine in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Bombeirinho
instructions: Combine equal parts Red Gooseberry Liquor and White Cachaça in a shaker with the juice of half a lemon, then shake with ice if desired. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

name: Boomerang
instructions: Combine 2 oz gin, 1/2 oz dry vermouth, 2 dashes bitters, and 1/2 tsp maraschino liqueur in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a cocktail glass, garnishing with a maraschino cherry.

name: Bora Bora
instructions: Blend pineapple juice, passion fruit juice, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice, then pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

name: Boston Sour
instructions: Shake 2 oz blended whiskey, juice of 1/2 lemon, 1 tsp powdered sugar, and 1 egg white with cracked ice, then fine strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and top with a cherry.

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Combine equal parts bourbon, Campari, and sweet vermouth in a mixing glass with ice, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled coupe. Express the oils from an orange peel over the drink and discard or use as garnish.

name: Bourbon Lemonade
instructions: Combine Bulleit Bourbon, lemonade, and Triple Sec in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently. Garnish with maraschino cherries.

name: Bourbon Mule

ingredients.name: light ginger beer, such as Fever-Tree Naturally Light

instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine bourbon and fresh lime juice, then top with light ginger beer. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig and a slice of lime.

name: Bourbon Old Fashioned
instructions: Muddle sugar with a splash of water in a glass, then add bourbon and ice. Stir gently and garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Boxcar
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz gin, 1 oz triple sec, 1 tsp lemon juice, 1/2 tsp grenadine, and 1 egg white in a shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, then fine strain into a whiskey sour glass.

name: Boza
instructions: Combine coarse bulghur, rice, and water in a pot, then cook until soft. Blend the mixture with powdered sugar, sourdough, and warm milk until smooth. Serve chilled or at room temperature.

name: Brain Damage
instructions: Layer Peach Schnapps, then Irish Cream, and finally grenadine in a shot glass.

name: Brain Fart
instructions: Combine 1 fifth of Everclear, 1 fifth of vodka, 2 liters of Mountain Dew, 2 liters of Surge, the juice from 1 small bottle of lemon juice, and 1 pint of rum in a punch bowl with ice, stirring gently until well mixed.

name: Bramble
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice, combine gin, lemon juice, and syrup, then stir gently. Drizzle blackberry liqueur over the top in a circular motion and garnish with a lemon slice and two blackberries.

name: Brandy Alexander
instructions: Combine equal parts brandy, dark crème de cacao, and cream in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe. Grate fresh nutmeg on top before serving.

name: Brandy Sour
instructions: Combine brandy, lemon juice, and a dash of angostura bitters in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brandy Wine Punch
instructions: Muddle oranges, lemon, and honey dew melons in a punch bowl, then add brandy, red wine, and sugar, stirring until dissolved. Top with club soda and serve over ice.

name: Brass Monkey
instructions: Combine equal parts vodka, dark rum, and orange juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Brazilian Coconut Cocktail
instructions: Combine coconut milk, sweetened condensed milk, cachaça or vodka, and coconut water in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brazilian Limeade
instructions: Juice the limes and combine the juice with sweetened condensed milk, cold water, and sugar in a blender. Add ice cubes and blend until smooth, then serve immediately.

name: Brazilian Strawberry Drink
instructions: Blend vodka, condensed milk, sugar, milk, milk cream, yogurt, and strawberries until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Breakfast Club Cocktail
instructions: Combine cereal milk, Demerara syrup, and bourbon in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass filled with your favorite colorful cereal.

name: Breakfast Mai Tai

ingredients.name: banana liqueur (preferably Giffard Banane du Bresil)

instructions: Combine overproof Jamaican rum, banana liqueur, orgeat, cinnamon syrup, lime juice, and black rum in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Breakfast Martini
instructions: Combine gin, triple sec, lemon juice, and orange marmalade in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Fine strain into a chilled coupe and serve with a slice of toast on the side.

name: Brigadier
instructions: Combine 4 oz of hot chocolate, 1 oz of Green Chartreuse, and 1 oz of Cherry Heering in a warmed mug and stir until well mixed.

name: Broadside
instructions: Fill a highball glass halfway with ice cubes, crush the wormwood and add it to the ice. Pour in the rum, Scotch, and bitters, then serve.

name: Brooklyn
instructions: Combine 2 oz rye whiskey, 1 oz dry vermouth, 1/4 oz maraschino liqueur, and 3 dashes of Angostura bitters with ice; stir until well-chilled and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Brown Sugar Oatmilk Shaken Espresso
instructions: Combine fresh brewed espresso and light brown sugar in a shaker with ice, then add unsweetened oatmilk. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bruce Wayne Cocktail
instructions: Combine cold brew coffee, bourbon, and maple syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Brunswick Cocktail
instructions: Combine whiskey, simple syrup, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass and float red wine on top.

name: Bubble Gum
instructions: Layer vodka, banana liqueur, orange juice, and peach schnapps in a shot glass.

name: Buccaneer
instructions: Pour the Corona into a beer pilsner, then gently add a shot of Bacardi Limon and stir lightly.

name: Buffalo Sweat
instructions: Combine Bacardi 151, Tabasco Sauce, and Orange Juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Bullfisher
instructions: Combine equal parts coconut rum and apple juice in a glass filled with ice, top with ginger ale, and stir gently. Garnish with an apple slice.

name: Bumble Bee
instructions: Layer Baileys into a shot glass, then gently pour Kahlua over the back of a spoon against the glass wall. Repeat with Sambuca to maintain separation, creating a bumble bee appearance.

name: Burhani/Borhani
instructions: In a mixing bowl, combine plain yoghurt, white pepper powder, mustard powder, fresh mint leaves paste, red chili powder, roasted cumin powder, roasted coriander powder, ginger paste, green chili paste, sugar, black salt, and salt. Gradually add water to achieve a smooth consistency, then serve chilled.

name: Burnt Caramel Manhattan
instructions: Combine bourbon, sweet vermouth, buttershot schnapps, raspberry Chambord, and a dash of Angostura bitters in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well and fine strain into a chilled coupe, then garnish with a cherry.

name: Butter Coffee
instructions: Blend fresh brewed coffee with coconut or MCT oil and unsalted butter or ghee until smooth; optionally sprinkle with cinnamon before serving.

name: Buttermilk
instructions: Blend yogurt, water, and salt until smooth, then pour into a glass and garnish with coriander leaves.

name: Cable Car

ingredients.name: Sugar Syrup(2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)

instructions: Combine spiced rum, orange Curacao, freshly squeezed lemon juice, sugar syrup, and pasteurized egg white in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Café Con Leche - Cuban Style

ingredients.name: espresso coffee - the Café Bustelo brand is common in Miami

instructions: Brew espresso and pour it into a cup, then add hot or steamed milk to your desired ratio. Sweeten with sugar to taste, stirring gently to combine.

name: Cafe Savoy
instructions: Fill a coffee mug almost to the top with coffee, then add 1/2 oz of milk, 1/2 oz of triple sec, and brandy to taste; stir to combine.

name: Caferio Cookie Shake
instructions: Blend coffee powder, chilled milk, optional sugar, cookie-cream ice cream, and crushed Oreo cookies until smooth. Serve immediately in a tall glass.

name: Caipireja
instructions: Muddle sugar with a splash of beer in a glass, then add vodka and fill with ice. Top with remaining beer and stir gently.

name: Caipirinha
instructions: Muddle lime wedges with sugar in an old-fashioned glass, fill with ice, then pour in Cachaça.

name: Caipirinha Black
instructions: Muddle green lime wedges with refined sugar in a glass, add black vodka, and fill with ice cubes. Stir gently to combine and serve.

name: Caipirissima
instructions: Muddle 2 lime wedges with 2 tablespoons of sugar in a Collins glass, then fill with crushed ice. Pour in 2-3 oz of white rum, stir gently, and serve.

name: Caipiroska
instructions: Muddle lime quarters and granulated white sugar in a glass until the sugar dissolves. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add vodka, and stir gently to combine.

name: Calamansi Juice
instructions: Combine sugar, fresh-squeezed calamansi juice, and water in a shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Calamity Jane
instructions: Muddle a lime slice, fresno chili, strawberry, and basil in a shaker, then add tequila, orange liqueur, and ancho reyes with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass.

name: Californication
instructions: Combine equal parts vodka, gin, white rum, and tequila with lemon juice and orange juice in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a tall glass filled with ice, then garnish with a fresh orange slice.

name: Campari Beer
instructions: In a 15 oz beer mug, pour 1 1/2 cl of Campari, then fill with a bottle of lager.

name: Canelazo

ingredients.name: Aguardiente or puntas(alcoholic drink from Ecuador)

instructions: In a saucepan, combine water, sugar, lime juice, cinnamon, and orange juice, then heat until the sugar dissolves. Stir in aguardiente or puntas, then serve warm.

name: Cantarito Tequila
instructions: Combine tequila, orange juice, lemon juice, and lime juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with grapefruit soda and stir gently.

name: Cape Codder
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add vodka and cranberry juice, then squeeze in fresh lime juice. Stir gently to combine.

name: Capeta
instructions: In a shaker, combine sweetened condensed milk, vodka, honey, guarana powder, ground cinnamon, and unsweetened cocoa powder with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Capipink
instructions: Muddle strawberries, raspberries, and blueberries with sugar in a glass, then add water and stir gently to combine.

name: Cappuccino

ingredients.name: rounded tablespoon finely ground coffee, preferably an espresso blend
pinch cocoa powder or ground cinnamon, optional

instructions: Combine a rounded tablespoon of finely ground coffee with cold milk in a suitable vessel, then stir until well mixed. Optionally, sprinkle a pinch of cocoa powder or ground cinnamon on top before serving.

name: Carajillo
instructions: Combine espresso with your choice of whiskey, rum, or brandy in a heatproof glass, stirring gently to blend.

name: Caramel Frappuccino
instructions: Blend milk, ice, caramel sauce, coffee powder, and vanilla extract until smooth, then pour into a glass and top with whipped cream.

name: Caramel Snickerdoodle Martini
instructions: Rim a chilled martini glass with warmed caramel and dip in cinnamon sugar. In a shaker, combine Smirnoff Kissed Caramel, heavy cream, and ground cinnamon with ice; shake well and fine strain into the prepared glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

name: Carrulim
instructions: Muddle rue and lime juice in a shaker, then add caña paraguaya and honey. Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Casa Blanca
instructions: Combine 2 oz light rum, 1 1/2 tsp triple sec, 1 1/2 tsp lime juice, and 1 1/2 tsp maraschino liqueur with ice, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Casino
instructions: Combine gin, cherry liqueur, orange bitters, and lemon juice with ice, then fine strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

name: Casino Royale
instructions: Combine 2 oz gin, 1/2 oz lemon juice, 1 tsp maraschino liqueur, 1 dash orange bitters, and 1 egg yolk in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a whiskey sour glass.

name: Chai E Zanjafeel

ingredients.name: Walnuts, very finely chopped or ground

instructions: Brew green tea with water, then stir in sugar, ground ginger, and finely chopped walnuts until well combined. Serve warm.

name: Champagne Cocktail
instructions: Place a sugar cube in a champagne flute and add a dash of Angostura bitters on top. Pour in the cognac, then gently top with chilled champagne. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Champagne Soup
instructions: Combine Champagne, Cointreau, lime juice, and sugar cane syrup in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Cheerwine
instructions: Combine Cheerwine, vodka, and lime juice in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently to mix.

name: Cherry Bourbon Smash
instructions: Muddle cherries, basil, and thyme in a shaker, then add lemon juice, bourbon, Cointreau, and white wine vinegar; shake with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer and garnish with a basil sprig.

name: Cherry Limeade
instructions: Muddle pitted cherries with sugar in a mixing glass, then add lime juice and water. Stir well and strain into a tall glass filled with ice.

name: Cherry Rum
instructions: Combine 1 1/4 oz light rum, 1 1/2 tsp cherry brandy, and 1 tbsp light cream with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Chicago Fizz
instructions: Shake light rum, port, lemon juice, powdered sugar, and egg white with ice, then fine strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Top with carbonated water and stir gently before serving.

name: Chikoo lassi
instructions: Blend chikoo, curd, milk, cardamom powder, and honey until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Chocolate Drink
instructions: Melt 125 grams of chocolate in a small amount of boiling water, then add 3/4 liter of milk. Heat gently while whisking until warmed through, avoiding boiling, and serve in a coffee mug.

name: Chocolate Milk
instructions: Pour milk into a shot glass, then layer chocolate liqueur on top, finishing with a dash of amaretto. Do not mix; consume immediately.

name: Chocolate Monkey
instructions: Blend equal parts banana liqueur, crème de cacao, chocolate syrup, chocolate ice cream, and milk until smooth. Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream.

name: Chocoline Milk
instructions: Combine Chocoline, Milk, and Sugar in a shaker with ice, then shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Christmas Tonic
instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine gin and Cedilla, then top with tonic. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a few raisins for a festive touch.

name: Chuhai

ingredients.name: Yuzu Juice or any fruit juice of choice

instructions: Combine shochu and yuzu juice in a glass filled with ice, then top with club soda and add simple syrup if desired. Stir gently to mix.

name: Churchill
instructions: In a glass, combine mineral water with a squeeze of lemon and a pinch of salt, stirring gently to mix.

name: Cinnamon Maple Whiskey Sour

ingredients.name: Bulleit bourbon or your bourbon of choice

instructions: Combine bourbon, fresh lemon juice, maple syrup, and ground cinnamon in a shaker with ice, then strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh ice.

name: Citrus Coke
instructions: Pour half the Coca-Cola into a highball glass, add 1 part Bacardi Limon, then top with the remaining Coca-Cola and stir gently.

name: Citrus Martini
instructions: Combine Absolut Citron, lemon juice, simple syrup, and triple sec in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: City Slicker
instructions: Combine 2 oz brandy, 1/2 oz triple sec, and 1 tablespoon lemon juice in a shaker filled with ice, then shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Clarito
instructions: Combine dry gin and French vermouth in a mixing glass with ice, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled coupe and garnish with a twist of lemon.

name: Classic Whiskey Sour
instructions: Combine bourbon whiskey, freshly squeezed lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously, then fine strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Clavis Riga
instructions: Combine Riga Black Balsam, rhubarb liqueur, apple juice, pomegranate syrup, and white chocolate syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled glass, then garnish with a twist of orange peel.

name: Clericot
instructions: In a large pitcher, combine dry white wine, lemon soda, and orange juice. Add fruits of your choice, stir gently, and serve over ice in a tall glass.

name: Clove Cocktail
instructions: Stir sweet vermouth, sloe gin, and Muscatel with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Clover Club
instructions: Dry shake gin, grenadine, lemon juice, and egg white to emulsify, then add ice and shake again. Fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Clover Club Cocktail
instructions: Combine gin, fresh lemon juice, raspberry syrup, and egg white in a shaker without ice. Shake vigorously, then add ice and shake again. Fine strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Cocktail Orange Ouzo
instructions: In a shaker, combine ouzo, orange juice, a splash of water, and fine grain sugar; shake well. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice, then add a squeeze of lime and garnish with pink grapefruit and fresh mint sprigs.

name: Coco Avocado

ingredients.name: Condensed milk, palm sugar, or honey for sweetener

instructions: Blend ripe avocado, young tender coconut, and your choice of sweetener with an ice cube until smooth and creamy. Serve immediately in a chilled glass.

name: Coco Dream
instructions: Blend coconut, raw sugar, cachaça, coconut milk, and condensed milk until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Coco loco
instructions: Combine equal parts white rum, coconut milk, milk, and a touch of sugar in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Coconut Coffee
instructions: Combine espresso, coconut milk, and condensed milk in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass. Top with whipped cream and optionally add coconut ice cream and coconut flesh.

name: Coconut Lime Cilantro Cooler

ingredients.name: sparkling water OR ginger ale OR club soda

instructions: In a glass filled with ice, combine coconut water, fresh lime juice, and optional rum, then top with sparkling water or ginger ale. Stir gently, garnish with fresh cilantro and a lime wedge.

name: Coconut Margarita
instructions: Blend ice, sweetened coconut cream, tequila, and triple sec until smooth, then pour into a glass and rim with sweetened flaked coconut.

name: Coconut Mint Collins
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with fresh lime juice in a glass, add Malibu Original, fill with ice, then top with soda water and a splash of lime.

name: Coffee Liqueur
instructions: Combine 10 tablespoons of instant coffee, 2 1/2 cups of sugar, and 2 1/2 cups of water in a pot and simmer for 1 hour; let cool. Stir in 4 tablespoons of vanilla extract and 1 quart of vodka, then transfer to a sealed jar and age for 2 to 3 weeks.

name: Coffee-Vodka
instructions: Boil 2 cups of water with 2 cups of sugar until dissolved, then turn off the heat and stir in 1/2 cup of instant coffee. Once cooled, combine with 1 1/2 cups of vodka and a chopped vanilla bean, cover tightly, and shake daily for 3 weeks. Strain and filter before serving.

name: Coke and Drops
instructions: Pour 1 dl of Coca-Cola into a cocktail glass, add 7 drops of lemon juice, and garnish with a lemon slice on the rim.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
instructions: Coarsely grind whole coffee beans and steep them in cold water for 12-24 hours, then strain the mixture to serve.

name: Cold Brew Old Fashioned
instructions: Combine black coffee, Rye, and orange bitters in a mixing glass with ice, then stir until well chilled and strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

name: Cold Coffee
instructions: Blend chilled milk, coffee powder, sugar, and vanilla until smooth, then swirl in Hersheys chocolate syrup. Pour into a glass, top with chocolate chip ice cream, and dust with cocoa powder.

name: Cold Relief Tea
instructions: Boil water and steep tea leaves, lemongrass, grated ginger, cardamom, black pepper, turmeric, cloves, and cinnamon for 10 minutes. Strain into a pot, add milk, sugar, honey, and jaggery, then heat gently until warm. Serve hot.

name: Colombian michelada
instructions: Rim a glass with salt, squeeze in lime juice, then fill with good summer beer.

name: Colorado Bulldog
instructions: Combine equal parts Kahlúa and vodka in a glass filled with ice, then add cream and top with cola. Stir gently to mix.

name: Comfort Collins
instructions: Combine Southern Comfort and lime juice in a glass filled with ice, then top with lemon-lime soda and stir gently.

name: Coquito

ingredients.name: dark spiced rum (to give it good flavor) or white rum (adjust to taste, may be omitted)

instructions: Blend coconut cream, coconut milk, evaporated milk, sweetened condensed milk, and rum if using, then add salt, cloves, nutmeg, and cinnamon. Adjust consistency with water if desired, then chill and serve in a glass garnished with a cinnamon stick.

name: Corn Juice
instructions: Blend sweet corn with sugar and salt to taste until smooth, then strain into a glass.

name: Corn n Oil
instructions: Quarter the lime and muddle it with falernum and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. Add añejo rum, fill with ice, and stir gently. Float blackstrap rum on top and serve with a straw.

name: CoronaRita
instructions: In a shaker, combine limes, orange juice, tequila, triple sec, and margarita mix with ice; shake well. Rim a glass with sea salt, then strain the mixture into the glass and top with Coronitas.

name: Corpse Reviver
instructions: Rinse a cocktail glass with absinthe and discard excess. Shake gin, triple sec, Lillet Blanc, and lemon juice with ice, then strain into the prepared glass.

name: Corpse Reviver no.2
instructions: Combine equal parts Rutte Dry Gin, De Kuyper Triple Sec, Lillet Blanc, and freshly squeezed lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then add a dash of La Fee Parisienne absinthe. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Cosmopolitan
instructions: Combine vodka, triple sec, lime juice, and cranberry juice with ice, then fine strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Cranberry Bourbon Sour
instructions: In a shaker, combine bourbon, lemon juice, 100% cranberry juice, maple syrup, and a dash of orange bitters with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a twist of orange zest.

name: Cranberry Mimosa
instructions: In a flute, combine equal parts sweetened cranberry juice and champagne, gently pouring the champagne to maintain the bubbles.

name: Cranberry Orange Whiskey Cocktail
instructions: Combine unsweetened cranberry juice, orange juice, whiskey, Cointreau, freshly squeezed lemon juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice; shake well. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice, top with ginger beer, and garnish with sprigs of thyme.

name: Cranberry Punch
instructions: Combine cranberry juice, pineapple juice, sugar, and almond flavoring, stirring until the sugar dissolves and the mixture is chilled. Just before serving, add ginger ale and an ice ring to keep the punch cold.

name: Cranberry Tonic
instructions: Combine lime syrup, orange juice, gin, and cranberry juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with tonic water and gently stir to combine.

name: Cream Soda
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, add 1 oz of spiced rum, then top with ginger ale.

name: Creamy Indian Espresso
instructions: Dissolve instant coffee powder and granulated sugar in hot water, then mix in milk until creamy. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

name: Creamy Mango Lassi
instructions: Blend mango pulp, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom powder until smooth, then pour into a glass and top with crushed almonds.

name: Creole Cream
instructions: Combine light rum, white vermouth, grenadine, lemon juice, and a dash of Angostura bitters in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled glass, then garnish with olives.

name: Crock-Pot Butterbeer Rum
instructions: In a slow cooker, combine water, cream soda, brown sugar, unsalted butter, half the butterscotch syrup, cinnamon sticks, vanilla, salt, and spiced rum. Cook on low for 2-3 hours, stirring occasionally, then serve topped with whipped cream, the remaining butterscotch syrup, and gold sanding sugar.

name: Crusta
instructions: Rim a chilled coupe with sugar. Combine brandy, fresh lemon juice, curaçao, simple syrup, Maraschino liqueur, and a dash of Angostura bitters in a shaker with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Cuba Libra
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, add dark rum, then squeeze lime juice into the glass. Top with Coca-Cola and garnish with a lime slice.

name: Cuba Libre
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine 5 cl white rum, 1 cl lime juice, and top with 12 cl cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Cuban Zombie
instructions: Combine Havana Club 3 year, Havana Club 7 year, orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, and ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a tall glass filled with ice. Add passion fruit and a splash of grenadine for color.

name: Cucumber Gin
instructions: Muddle fresh cucumber in a glass, then add gin, mint syrup, and juice from a lemon wedge. Fill with ice cubes, top with tonic water, and stir gently to combine.

name: Cucumber Lemonade
instructions: Muddle cucumber in a glass, then mix in frozen lemonade concentrate and top with lemon-lime carbonated beverage. Stir gently to combine and serve immediately.

name: Cucumber Lime Mint Agua Fresca

ingredients.name: cucumbers (ends trimmed, but peel still on, coarsely chopped)
packed (spearmint) mint leaves, woody stems removed

instructions: Blend cucumbers, lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and water until smooth, then strain into a pitcher over ice. Stir gently and serve chilled.

name: Cynar Spritz
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add equal parts Prosecco and Cynar, followed by a splash of club soda. Squeeze in a lemon wedge and garnish with olives.

name: Daddy don't go

ingredients.name: Fruit punch juice (Orange, pineapple and passion fruit)

instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then combine Ron and fruit punch juice, stirring gently. Garnish with fresh mint.

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Combine 4.5 cl white rum, 2.5 cl lime juice, and 1.5 cl syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Dalgona Coffee
instructions: Whisk equal parts coffee powder, sugar, and boiling water until frothy. Spoon the mixture over a glass of cold milk and serve.

name: Damned if you do
instructions: Pour 0.75 oz of whiskey and 0.25 oz of Hot Damn into a shot glass. Consume as desired.

name: Danbooka
instructions: Combine 3 parts coffee with 1 part Everclear in a coffee mug and mix well.

name: Danish Polar Bear

ingredients.name: Ice cubes or crushed ice cubes

instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add vodka and blue curaçao. Top with lemon soda and stir gently to combine.

name: Danish Summer
instructions: Combine Råstoff Strawberry-Rhubarb, Sprite, and freshly squeezed lime in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently to mix.

name: Dark 'n' Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in 6 cl of dark rum, and top with 10 cl of ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Dark and Stormy
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in 5 cl of dark rum, and top with 10 cl of ginger beer.

name: Dark Caipirinha
instructions: Muddle 2 tsp of demerara sugar with lime wedges in a highball glass, then fill with ice cubes. Pour in 2 1/2 oz of cachaca and stir well.

name: Darkwood Sling
instructions: Combine 1 part Cherry Heering, 1 part Soda water, and 1 part Orange juice in a shaker with ice. Shake gently and strain into a cocktail glass filled with ice.

name: Dawet
instructions: Mix rice flours and cornstarch with water until smooth, then freeze the mixture until slushy. Serve in a chilled glass, optionally garnished with a sprinkle of additional cornstarch for texture.

name: Dayak Onion Tea
instructions: Combine Dayak onions and water in a pot, simmer until the onions are tender, then strain the liquid into a cup. Stir in honey to taste and serve hot.

name: Death in the Afternoon
instructions: Pour 2 shots of absinthe into a chilled margarita glass and top with champagne.

name: Death in the Gulf Stream
instructions: Combine Holland Gin, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Angostura Bitters in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Debonair
instructions: Combine equal parts ginger liqueur and whiskey scotch single malt in a mixing glass with ice, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Derby
instructions: Combine 6 cl of gin with ice in a mixing glass, stir well, then strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with mint leaves.

name: Desert Colada
instructions: Blend prickly pear syrup, cream of coconut, rum, pineapple juice, and ice until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Detox Green Juice
instructions: Blend spinach, orange juice, mango, celery, parsley, and a pinch of salt until smooth; serve in a tall glass.

name: Detox Green Tea
instructions: Brew green tea and let it cool. Muddle dried basil and mint leaves in a pitcher, then add honey, lemon juice, and cooled tea. Stir in water, mix well, and serve over ice.

name: Devil's Ice Tea
instructions: Combine Bacardi 151, rye whiskey, tequila, gin, vodka, rum, brandy, dark rum, triple sec, lime juice, lemon juice, and sweet and sour in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a tall glass filled with ice, then top with Coke.

name: Devil's Own
instructions: Combine Angostura Bitters, Dry Vermouth, Cointreau, and Gin in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Diana's lips

ingredients.name: Mezcal infused with cocoa beans and pink berries

instructions: Combine mezcal infused with cocoa beans and pink berries with lime juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass and top with Schweppes Tonic Hibiscus. Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Diesel
instructions: Pour 1/2 pint of lager into a pint glass, add a dash of blackcurrant cordial, then top with 1/2 pint of cider, achieving a dark color similar to Guinness.

name: Dirty Martini
instructions: Combine vodka, dry vermouth, and olive brine with ice in a shaker and mix well. Rub the rim of a chilled cocktail glass with lemon, then fine strain the mixture into the glass and garnish with an olive.

name: Dirty Nipple
instructions: Layer Kahlua, then Sambuca, and finally Baileys Irish Cream in a shot glass, ensuring Baileys sits on top.

name: Dirty Snowmen
instructions: Rim a glass with melted chocolate and coat with chocolate shavings. In the glass, combine vanilla ice cream, hot chocolate, and Baileys, then top with whipped cream.

name: Dolce Vita
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add equal parts of gancia and sparkling wine, followed by a few drops of aromatic bitters. Stir gently and garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Dole Whip Lemonade
instructions: Blend frozen pineapple, lemonade, and coconut milk until smooth, then serve in a tall glass. Garnish with pineapple wedges and maraschino cherries.

name: Dom Pedro
instructions: Blend equal parts Amarula Cream and Frangelico with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and a splash of coconut cream until smooth. Serve in a chilled glass, then sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon and grated chocolate on top.

name: Doodh Cola
instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes, then pour in chilled milk followed by chilled cola, allowing them to mix gently.

name: Dorflinger
instructions: Combine gin, absinthe, and orange bitters in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Downshift
instructions: In a hurricane glass, combine 1 part Sprite and 2 shots of tequila, then add 2 parts fruit punch. Float 151 proof rum on top.

name: Dr. Disaronno
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then pour equal parts Disaronno and Dr. Pepper over the ice, stirring gently to combine.

name: Dragon Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend cubed and frozen dragon fruit, cubed and frozen mango, frozen banana quarters, almond milk, lime juice, whey protein powder, and ice cubes until smooth. Serve immediately.

name: Dragon's Breath Mojito

ingredients.name: red chili (sliced thinly, seeds removed for less spice)

instructions: Muddle fresh mint leaves and sliced red chili in a glass, then add white rum, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup; fill with ice and top with club soda, stirring gently to combine.

name: Dragonfly
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then combine 1 1/2 oz gin and 4 oz ginger ale, stirring gently. Squeeze in lime juice and drop the wedge into the glass.

name: Drinking Chocolate
instructions: Slowly heat 2 oz of heavy cream, 6-8 oz of milk, 1 cinnamon stick, and 1 vanilla bean for 15-20 minutes; remove the cinnamon and bean, then stir in 2 oz of finely chopped dark chocolate until melted. Serve in a coffee mug topped with fresh whipped cream.

name: Drunken Monkey Cocktail
instructions: Combine orange-pineapple juice blend, coconut rum, spiced rum, and bitters in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass. Garnish with fresh ground nutmeg, maraschino cherries, lime slices, and fresh pineapple wedges.

name: Drunken Peanut Butter Cups

ingredients.name: Peanut Butter (optional, for garnishing the rim of the glass)
Crushed Reese's Pieces (optional, for garnishing the rim of the glass)

instructions: Rim a glass with peanut butter and crushed Reese's Pieces if desired. Combine vodka, Reese's infused vodka, milk, Chocolate Liqueur, and ice in a shaker, then strain into the prepared glass. Drizzle chocolate syrup on top and garnish with Reese's Cups.

name: Dry Martini
instructions: Combine 1 2/3 oz gin and 1/3 oz dry vermouth in a mixing glass with ice, stir well, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Dry Rob Roy
instructions: Combine 2 1/2 oz Scotch and 1 1/2 tsp dry vermouth in a mixing glass filled with ice, stir well, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Dubliner
instructions: Combine Irish whiskey, Grand Marnier, red vermouth, and a dash of orange bitters in a mixing glass with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Dubonnet Cocktail
instructions: Stir together 1 1/2 oz Dubonnet Rouge, 3/4 oz gin, and 1 dash of bitters with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

name: Duchamp's Punch
instructions: Combine pisco, lime juice, pineapple syrup, St. Germain, Angostura bitters, and a pinch of pepper, then fine strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass with a large ice cube. Garnish with two sprigs of lavender.

name: Dutchman’s Daiquiri

ingredients.name: Red chile pepper, seeded and sliced
Rich sugar syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)

instructions: Muddle the sliced red chile pepper in a shaker, then add Bols genever, lime juice, and rich sugar syrup. Shake with ice and fine strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Earl Grey Gin Tea
instructions: Brew earl grey tea with boiled water, then cool it down with cold water. In a glass filled with ice, combine the tea, gin, and honey or sweetener, stirring gently. Optionally, add milk or cream before serving.

name: Easy sangria
instructions: In a large pitcher, combine chopped oranges, pears, lemon, red berries, juiced lemon, caster sugar, and cinnamon. Add light red wine and Spanish brandy, stirring gently to mix. Fill glasses with ice, pour the sangria over, and top with sparkling water.

name: Egg Coffee
instructions: Whisk together egg yolk, sweetened condensed milk, white sugar, and vanilla extract until creamy. Brew black Vietnamese coffee and pour it into a cup, then gently fold in the egg mixture. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

name: Egg Cream
instructions: In a coffee mug, combine 2 tablespoons of chocolate syrup with 6 ounces of whole milk, then top with 6 ounces of soda water and stir gently. Serve with a straw.

name: Egg Nog - Healthy
instructions: Whip together egg substitute and sugar, then mix with condensed milk, skimmed milk, vanilla, and rum. Chill overnight and serve in a Collins glass, sprinkling nutmeg on top.

name: Egg Nog #4
instructions: Beat 6 egg yolks until blended, then gradually add 1/4 cup sugar, beating until thick and lemon-colored. Stir in 2 cups milk, 1/2 cup light rum, 1/2 cup bourbon, 1 tsp vanilla, and 1/4 tsp salt, then chill. Whip 1 cup cream and set aside. In another bowl, beat 6 egg whites to soft peaks, gradually adding 1/4 cup sugar until stiff peaks form. Fold the yolk mixture and whipped cream into the egg whites. Serve immediately in a punch bowl, sprinkled with nutmeg.

name: Egg-Nog - Classic Cooked
instructions: Beat together 6 eggs, 1/4 cup sugar, and 1/4 tsp salt in a large saucepan. Stir in 2 cups milk and cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thickened and reaching 160°F. Remove from heat, add 2 more cups milk and 1 tsp vanilla, then refrigerate until chilled. Serve in a pitcher, adding optional garnishes like chocolate curls, cinnamon sticks, or flavored spirits.

name: Eggnog
instructions: In a mixing bowl, whisk together egg, honey or sugar, and a pinch of salt until well combined. Gradually stir in milk until smooth, then chill before serving.

name: Egyptian Fakhfakhina Drink
instructions: Combine diced and sliced fruits in a glass, adding optional ingredients if desired. Fill with ice cubes and top with additional sliced fruit for garnish.

name: Egyptian Sobia Drink

ingredients.name: sugar (more or less depending on your liking)

instructions: Soak dry uncooked rice in water for several hours, then drain and blend with fresh water until smooth. Strain the mixture into a bowl, adding sugar, powdered milk, coconut milk, and vanilla powder, stirring until well combined. Serve chilled.

name: El Diablo
instructions: Combine tequila, crème de cassis, and lime juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a tall glass filled with ice and top with ginger beer.

name: El Presidente
instructions: Combine white rum, dry vermouth, orange curaçao, and grenadine in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Elderflower Caipirinha
instructions: Muddle the lime in a Collins glass, then fill with crushed ice and add Cachaca and elderflower cordial. Stir well, top with more crushed ice, and serve.

name: Elderflower Cooler
instructions: In a tall glass filled with cubed ice, combine gin and elderflower cordial, then top with soda. Stir gently and garnish with cucumber slices and mint.

name: Elderflower French 75
instructions: Combine gin, elderflower liqueur, and freshly squeezed lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a flute and top with champagne or prosecco.

name: Elderflower-tini
instructions: Combine vodka, lemon juice, and elderflower syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Empellón Cocina's Fat-Washed Mezcal
instructions: Combine 2 oz mezcal and 3/4 oz chocolate liqueur in a mixing glass with ice, stir for 45 seconds, then strain into a chilled coupe. Carefully sink 1/2 oz coffee liqueur down the inside of the coupe over a spoon.

name: English Garden Cocktail
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and cucumber slices in a shaker, then add gin, elderflower juice, apple juice, and lime juice with crushed ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with crushed ice, garnishing with additional mint leaves.

name: English Highball
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine 3/4 oz brandy, 3/4 oz gin, and 3/4 oz sweet vermouth. Top with carbonated water, add a twist of lemon peel, stir gently, and serve.

name: English Rose Cocktail
instructions: Rub the rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip it in powdered sugar. Shake apricot brandy, gin, dry vermouth, grenadine, and lemon juice with ice, then strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

name: Es Cendol

ingredients.name: Amanprana Gula Java Coconut blossom sugar

instructions: Combine rice flour, sago flour, water, and a pinch of salt in a bowl, then mix until smooth. Cook the mixture over low heat, stirring until it thickens, then pour into a mold and let it set. Once set, cut into pieces and serve with water infused with pandan leaves, coconut milk, and sweeten with coconut blossom sugar.

name: Es Jeruk
instructions: Muddle unripe green mango, sugar, cardamom, and black salt in a glass. Add fresh mint and stir gently, then top with orange juice and a sprinkle of sugar.

name: Es Sarang Burung

ingredients.name: Melon, pick up the fruit with a baller
Basil seeds, soak in a little warm water

instructions: Dissolve sugar and red gelatin powder in hot water, then let it cool and set. In a glass, layer the melon balls, kiwi pieces, nata de coco, and soaked basil seeds. Pour the red syrup over the layers, add ice, and top with cold water.

name: Es Selendang Mayang
instructions: Combine hunkwee flour, rice flour, water, and salt to form a batter. Pour into a steamer, layering with green pasta and coconut milk, then steam until cooked through. Serve warm.

name: Espanhola
instructions: Blend medium pineapple with red or dry wine and condensed milk until smooth, then add crushed ice and blend again until frosty. Serve in a chilled glass.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Combine 5 cl vodka and 1 cl coffee liqueur with ice, then shake and fine strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Espresso Rumtini
instructions: Combine 1 shot of rum, 1/2 shot of vanilla syrup, 1 shot of espresso, and 1 shot of coffee in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Dust with chocolate powder and garnish with coffee beans.

name: Fahrenheit 5000
instructions: Add a dash of Tabasco sauce to the bottom of a shot glass, then carefully layer in 1/2 oz of Firewater followed by 1/2 oz of Absolut Peppar.

name: Fall Old-Fashioned
instructions: Combine bourbon, infused bourbon, maple syrup, Angostura Aromatic Bitters, and a splash of water in a mixing glass with ice. Add star anise, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, and the split vanilla bean. Stir well and strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

name: Fast Food Classic
instructions: Combine equal parts Coke, root beer, Sprite, and Mountain Dew in a tall glass filled with ice, then stir gently to mix.

name: Fernet with coke
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then pour in equal parts Fernet and Coca Cola, stirring gently to combine.

name: Fig Bourbon Cider Smash
instructions: In a shaker, combine apple cider, orange zest, orange juice, fig preserves, and bourbon; shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with sparkling water and garnish with fresh figs.

name: Figgy Thyme
instructions: Crush ice and fill a highball glass. Muddle figs and thyme in a shaker, then add honey vodka, lemon juice, and a large ice cube; shake until chilled and strain into the glass. Top with tonic water and add 2 dashes of Angostura bitters.

name: Fireball Hot Toddies
instructions: In a heatproof mug, combine boiling water, warm caramel, honey, lemon juice, and Fireball, stirring until well mixed. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a star anise for added aroma.

name: Firetruck
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add equal parts of Jägermeister and red soda, stirring gently to combine.

name: Firetruck: Emergency Response
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add equal parts jägermeister and vodka, topping with red soda. Stir gently to combine and serve.

name: Flaming Dr. Pepper
instructions: In a Collins glass, combine Amaretto, vodka, and Bacardi. Top with Dr. Pepper and beer, then carefully float 151 proof rum on top. Ignite the rum and serve immediately.

name: Flaming Engineer
instructions: In a tall glass, combine equal parts Molson Canadian beer, amaretto liqueur, Canadian Club whisky, and orange juice. Stir gently to mix, then serve immediately.

name: Flaming Lamborghini
instructions: Pour 1 oz of Sambuca and 1 oz of Kahlua into a cocktail glass and provide a straw. In separate shot glasses, pour 1 oz each of Baileys and Blue Curacao. Ignite the mixture in the cocktail glass and drink through the straw; as you near the bottom, extinguish the flame by adding the Baileys and Blue Curacao, then continue drinking until finished.

name: Flaming Moe
instructions: Combine equal parts brandy, peppermint schnapps, sloe gin, blackberry liqueur, and strawberry juice in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a heat-resistant glass, then carefully float high-proof rum on top. Ignite the rum and serve immediately.

name: Flander's Flake-Out
instructions: Pour 1/4 glass of Sambuca and 3/4 glass of Sarsaparilla into a Collins glass, then stir gently to combine.

name: Flying Dutchman
instructions: Fill an old-fashioned glass with ice, then combine gin and triple sec; stir well.

name: Flying Scotchman
instructions: Combine 1 oz Scotch, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 1 dash bitters, and 1/4 tsp sugar syrup with ice, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Foxy Lady
instructions: Combine 1/2 oz Amaretto, 1/2 oz Creme de Cacao, and 2 oz light cream with ice, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Frappé
instructions: Blend 1/2 cup black coffee, 1/2 cup milk, and 1-2 tsp sugar at high speed for about 1 minute until frothy. Pour into a highball glass and enjoy with a straw.

name: Freddy Kruger
instructions: Layer 1/2 oz of Jägermeister, then 1/2 oz of Sambuca, and finally 1/2 oz of Vodka in a shot glass.

name: French 75
instructions: In a shaker with ice, combine gin, superfine sugar, and lemon juice; shake well and strain into a chilled Collins glass. Top with chilled Champagne and garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: French Connection
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine 1 1/2 oz of Cognac and 3/4 oz of Amaretto, then stir gently.

name: French Martini
instructions: Combine vodka, raspberry liqueur, and pineapple juice with ice, shake well, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express lemon peel over the drink.

name: French Negroni
instructions: Combine gin, Lillet, and sweet vermouth with ice in a shaker, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Express the oils from an orange peel over the drink before discarding it.

name: French Pearl
instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a shaker, then add gin, fresh lime juice, and absinthe. Shake well with ice and fine strain into a chilled coupe.

name: French Sangria

ingredients.name: Peach / nectarine / other seasonal fruits thinly sliced

instructions: In a large pitcher, combine red wine, brandy, simple syrup, lime juice, and Provençale blend. Add thinly sliced orange, lime, and seasonal fruits, then stir gently. Top with lemon soda before serving over ice.

name: Frisco Sour
instructions: Combine blended whiskey, Benedictine, lemon juice, and lime juice with ice, then fine strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a slice of lime.

name: Frosé
instructions: Freeze rosé in a 13x9" pan until nearly solid, at least 6 hours. Boil sugar with ½ cup water until dissolved, then add strawberries and let infuse for 30 minutes; strain and chill. Blend frozen rosé with lemon juice, 3½ ounces strawberry syrup, and 1 cup crushed ice until smooth, then freeze until thickened, about 25–35 minutes. Blend again for a slushy texture and serve in cocktail glasses.

name: Frosted Lemonade
instructions: Blend freshly squeezed lemon juice, sugar, water, and vanilla ice cream until smooth. Serve immediately in a chilled glass.

name: Frozen Cantaloupe Margarita
instructions: Blend frozen cantaloupes, coconut milk, silver tequila, lime juice, Cointreau, and agave or honey until smooth. Optionally, rim a glass with salt and pour the mixture in.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
instructions: Blend 1 1/2 oz light rum, 1 tbsp triple sec, 1 1/2 oz lime juice, 1 tsp sugar, and 1 cup crushed ice on low for five seconds, then on high until firm. Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with a cherry, and serve.

name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
instructions: Blend 2 oz light rum, 1 tbsp lime juice, 6 mint leaves, and 1 tsp sugar with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
instructions: Blend 1 1/2 oz light rum, 4 chunks of pineapple, 1 tbsp lime juice, and 1/2 tsp sugar with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

name: Fruit Cooler
instructions: Toss strawberries with sugar and refrigerate overnight. Juice the lemon, reserving two slices, then mix the lemon juice, strawberries, apple juice, and soda water. In a highball glass filled with ice and a slice of apple, pour the mixture and add the lemon slices.

name: Fruit Flip-Flop
instructions: Blend 1 cup of yoghurt with 1 cup of fruit juice until smooth, then pour into one tall glass, two medium glasses, or three small glasses.

name: Fruit Shake
instructions: Blend 1 cup of yoghurt, 1 banana, 4 oz of frozen orange juice, 1/2 piece of textural fruit, and 6 ice cubes until smooth. Pour into a highball glass.

name: Funk and Soul
instructions: Combine 2 shots of rum, 1 shot of apricot nectar, 1 shot of pomegranate juice, and the juice of half a lemon in a shaker with ice, then strain into a Collins glass and top with soda water.

name: Fuzzy Asshole
instructions: Fill a coffee mug halfway with hot coffee, then add an equal amount of Peach Schnapps. Stir gently and enjoy while hot.

name: Fuzzy Navel
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then combine equal parts Peach Schnapps and Orange Juice, stirring gently to mix.

name: Gagliardo
instructions: Combine 5 parts peach vodka, 3 parts lemon juice, 1 part Galliano, and 1 part rose syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Galack Colada
instructions: Blend ice cubes, Galack, pineapple juice, rum, coconut milk, Malibu, and sweetened condensed milk until smooth, then serve in a chilled glass.

name: Galaxie Cocktail
instructions: Combine lemon and lime juice, sugar syrup, triple sec, and butterfly pea infused tequila in a shaker with crushed lemon and magic ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Gazpacho
instructions: Blend tomatoes, pepper, garlic, olive oil, vinegar, and water until smooth; chill before serving.

name: GG
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice, pour in 2 1/2 shots of Galliano, then top with ginger ale.

name: Gibson
instructions: Combine gin and dry vermouth in a mixing glass with ice, stir until well chilled, then strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a pickled onion.

name: Gimlet
instructions: Combine 2 1/2 oz gin, 1/2 oz lime juice, and 1/2 oz sugar syrup in a shaker with ice. Shake well and fine strain into a chilled martini glass, garnishing with a lime wheel.

name: Gin & Tonic
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add gin, top with tonic water, and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lemon and fresh cucumber.

name: Gin and Soda
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add 2 oz of gin and 5 oz of soda water; stir well and garnish with a wedge of lime.

name: Gin Coke
instructions: Combine gin, Coke, and lime juice in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently to mix.

name: Gin Cooler
instructions: In a Collins glass, stir powdered sugar with 2 oz. of carbonated water. Fill the glass with ice, add gin, then top with more carbonated water and stir gently. Garnish with lemon peel and an orange spiral, letting the end of the spiral dangle over the rim.

name: Gin Daisy
