instructions: Combine 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, 1/2 tsp superfine sugar, and 1/2 tsp grenadine in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry and an orange slice.

name: Gin Elderflower Fizz
instructions: Combine gin, elderflower liqueur, fresh lime juice, and simple syrup in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass filled with ice and top with club soda or sparkling water.

name: Gin Fizz
instructions: Shake gin, lemon juice, and powdered sugar with ice, then strain into a highball glass. Top with carbonated water and garnish with a lemon slice.

name: Gin Fizz with Pomegranate
instructions: Muddle pomegranate and sugar in a shaker, then add gin, lemon juice, and ice; shake well. Fine strain into a glass and top with club soda. Garnish with fresh rosemary.

name: Gin Lemon
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then pour in 6 cl of gin and 8 cl of lemon juice. Gently mix and garnish with a slice of lemon.

name: Gin Rickey
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, then combine gin and grenadine and pour over the ice. Squeeze in the juice of half a lemon and top with soda water, garnishing with lime.

name: Gin Sling
instructions: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and lemon juice, then mix in gin. Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass, garnish with an orange peel twist, and serve.

name: Gin Smash
instructions: Muddle a sugar cube with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube, then stir gently. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry before serving.

name: Gin Sour
instructions: Combine 2 oz gin, 1 oz lemon juice, and 1/2 tsp superfine sugar in a shaker with ice, shake well, and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

name: Gin Squirt
instructions: Stir together gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice, then strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with carbonated water and gently stir. Garnish with pineapple chunks and strawberries.

name: Gin Swizzle
instructions: Combine lime juice, superfine sugar, gin, and bitters in a shaker with ice, then shake well. Fill a highball glass with ice, stir until frosted, and strain the mixture into the glass. Top with club soda.

name: Gin Toddy
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, mix powdered sugar with water until dissolved, then add gin and one ice cube. Stir gently, garnish with a twist of lemon peel, and serve.

name: Gin Tonic
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, add gin, top with tonic water, and squeeze in a lemon wedge before garnishing with it.

name: Gin Tonica
instructions: In a tall glass filled with ice, combine gin and tonic water. Squeeze in lime juice and add grapefruit slices, rosemary, juniper berries, and strawberries for garnish.

name: Ginger Infused Water
instructions: Infuse sliced ginger and a pinch of cinnamon in water for several hours, then strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Ginger Lemon Tea
instructions: Boil water with sliced ginger root, then steep for 10 minutes. Strain into a cup, add fresh lime juice and honey, stirring until dissolved.

name: Ginger Lime Whiskey Sour
instructions: Muddle fresh ginger with granulated sugar and lime juice in a shaker, then add whiskey and water. If using, include egg white for texture, shake well, and fine strain into a chilled glass.

name: Ginger Milk Tea
instructions: Steep a teabag of black tea in hot water, then add fresh ginger and lemongrass, allowing it to infuse. Remove the tea bag, stir in sugar and fresh milk, and serve hot.

name: Ginger Mint Tea
instructions: Muddle fresh ginger and mint in a heatproof vessel, then pour in boiled water and steep for a few minutes before serving hot.

name: Gingerbread Eggnog
instructions: Rim a glass with cinnamon sugar, then combine eggnog, vodka, Kahlúa, molasses, and ground ginger in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass, topping with whipped cream.

name: Gingerbread latte

ingredients.name: ground ginger, plus extra to serve
ground nutmeg plus extra to serve
whipped cream and mini gingerbread men, to serve

instructions: In a saucepan, combine whole milk, ground ginger, cinnamon, ground nutmeg, soft brown sugar, and vanilla extract, heating gently until warm. If desired, stir in hot espresso, then pour into a mug and top with whipped cream, garnishing with extra spices and mini gingerbread men.

name: Glögg
instructions: Combine red wine, vodka, sugar, orange zest, cardamom pods, sliced ginger, cloves, and cinnamon in a pot; heat gently to infuse flavors without boiling. Serve warm, garnished with orange slices, slivered almonds, and raisins.

name: Gluehwein
instructions: Boil sugar, cinnamon, and cloves in water for 30 minutes, then strain the spiced water and combine with red wine. Heat gently until just below boiling; for a non-alcoholic version, allow to boil. Adjust with lemon peel to taste and serve in an Irish coffee cup.

name: Glühwein
instructions: Combine red wine, sugar, cloves, and a cinnamon stick in a pot over low heat, stirring until the sugar dissolves. Add orange peel and gently warm without boiling, then serve warm in a mug.

name: God Father
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine 3.5 cl of whiskey and 3.5 cl of DiSaronno, then stir gently.

name: God Mother
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, combine 3.5 cl of vodka and 3.5 cl of DiSaronno, then stir gently.

name: Godchild
instructions: Combine vodka, amaretto, and heavy cream with cracked ice, shake well, then strain into a chilled champagne flute.

name: Godfather
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Scotch and 3/4 oz Amaretto in an old-fashioned glass filled with ice, then stir gently.

name: Godmother
instructions: Pour 1 1/2 oz vodka and 3/4 oz amaretto over ice in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

name: Golden Brown
instructions: Combine gin, coffee liqueur, espresso coffee, and orange juice in a shaker with ice, then fine strain into a chilled glass. Garnish with a slide of orange peel.

name: Golden Dream
instructions: Combine 2 cl Galliano, 2 cl Triple Sec, 2 cl orange juice, and 1 cl cream with ice, then fine strain into a chilled martini glass.

name: Golden Glow Water

ingredients.name: sparkling water or kombucha for topping
Optinal: Citrus slice and fresh mint for garnishing

instructions: In a mixing vessel, combine water, ground ginger, ground turmeric, ground cayenne pepper, honey, molasses, and lemon juice, stirring until well blended. Pour into a glass and top with sparkling water or kombucha. Optionally, garnish with a citrus slice and fresh mint.

name: Golden Slipper
instructions: Combine yellow chartreuse, egg, Danziger Goldwasser, and lemon juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a chilled glass.

name: Good Vibrations

ingredients.name: Orange Soda (to fill rest of glass)

instructions: Fill a glass with ice, add tequila, and top with orange soda to fill the rest of the glass.

name: Grand Blue
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 cl Malibu rum, 1 1/2 cl peach schnapps, 1 1/2 cl blue curacao, and 3 cl sweet and sour in a shaker with ice, then strain into an old-fashioned glass.

name: Grandma's Apple Pie 'Ala Mode' Moonshine
instructions: Combine apple cider, apple juice, cinnamon, clove, white sugar, brown sugar, 190 proof grain alcohol, and vanilla vodka in a large container. Stir until sugars dissolve, then chill before serving.

name: Grass Jelly Drink
instructions: In a glass, combine grass jelly with water or soybean milk and simple syrup, then add crushed ice and stir gently to mix.

name: Grass Skirt
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz gin, 1 oz triple sec, 1 oz pineapple juice, and 1/2 tsp grenadine with ice, then shake well and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

name: Grasshopper
instructions: Combine 3/4 oz Green Creme de Menthe, 3/4 oz white Creme de Cacao, and 3/4 oz light cream in a cocktail shaker with ice, then shake and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Green Beast
instructions: Muddle cucumber in a shaker, then add absinthe, simple sugar syrup, lime juice, and water; shake with ice and strain into a tall glass filled with ice.

name: Green Lagoon
instructions: Combine vodka, blue curaçao, and pineapple juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Greyhound
instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice, pour in 1 1/2 oz vodka, then top with 3 oz grapefruit juice and stir gently.

name: Grilled Grapefruit Paloma Cocktail
instructions: Muddle limes and sugar in a shaker, then add grilled grapefruit juice, tequila or mezcal, and simple syrup with ice; shake well. Strain into a glass filled with ice, top with club soda, and rim the glass with kosher salt.

name: Grim Reaper
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, combine 1 oz Kahlua and 1 oz 151 proof rum. Quickly add ice and drizzle a dash of grenadine over the ice to create a red tint.

name: Grinch Drink
instructions: Combine equal parts Peach Schnapps, Bacardi Rum, and Orange Juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass and top with Lemon-lime Pop. Drizzle Blue Curacao on top for a layered effect.

name: Grog
instructions: In a heatproof mug, combine brown rum, fresh lemon juice, and brown sugar, then stir until the sugar dissolves. Add hot water and a pinch of cinnamon, then garnish with a slice of orange.

name: Guarapita
instructions: Muddle mint leaves and lime juice in a shaker, then add rum, passion fruit juice, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Guayacolita
instructions: In a tall glass, combine equal parts beer pilsner and Coca-cola, gently mixing to combine.

name: H.D.
instructions: In a beer mug, combine 4 cl whisky and 8 cl Baileys Irish cream, then fill the glass with hot coffee.

name: Halloween Punch
instructions: Combine cherry juice, orange peel, red chili flakes, cloves, and ginger in a large saucepan and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool, then chill for at least 4 hours. When ready to serve, pour into a jug, add vodka if desired, and serve in glasses with a straw, garnished with a fangs sweet.

name: Hanky Panky
instructions: Combine London Dry Gin, Sweet Red Vermouth, and Fernet Branca in a mixing glass with ice, then strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Happy Skipper
instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice, pour in 1 1/2 cl of spiced rum, and top with ginger ale. Squeeze in lime juice to taste.

name: Happy Soda
instructions: In a glass filled with ice cubes, combine chilled soda water, sweetened condensed milk, and cocopandan syrup. Stir gently to mix and enjoy.

name: Hard Apple Cider

ingredients.name: Trader Joe's Spice Apple Cider or your friendly neighborhood apple cider brand

instructions: Combine equal parts apple cider and Fireball Cinnamon Whiskey in a glass filled with ice, then stir gently. Garnish with a slice of apple.

name: Harry Potter Butterbeer
instructions: Combine cream soda, caramel extract, and sake in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass filled with ice.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine vodka and orange juice, then stir gently. Float Galliano on top and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

name: Havana Cocktail
instructions: Combine 1 oz light rum, 1 oz pineapple juice, and 1 tsp lemon juice in a shaker with ice, shake well, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hawaiian Cocktail
instructions: Combine 2 oz gin, 1/2 oz triple sec, and 1 tbsp pineapple juice with ice, then fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Hemingway Special
instructions: Combine 12 parts rum, 8 parts grapefruit juice, 3 parts maraschino liqueur, and 3 parts lime juice with ice, then shake and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Herbal flame
instructions: Pour 5 shots of Hot Damn into a mason jar, then fill with very sweet tea. Stir with a cinnamon stick and leave it in for added flavor.

name: Hi-Fi
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then add vodka and top with orange soda. Stir gently to combine and serve immediately.

name: Hibiscus Cherry Vodka Spritz
instructions: Muddle fresh cherries and dried hibiscus flowers in a shaker, then add honey, lemon juice, pineapple juice, and vodka; shake with ice and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with sparkling water and stir gently.

name: Hibiscus Mint Tea
instructions: Steep dried hibiscus petals in hot water, then strain into a pitcher. Add fresh mint leaves and lemon juice, stirring gently to combine. Serve over ice for a refreshing drink.

name: Highland Fling Cocktail
instructions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Scotch, 3/4 oz sweet vermouth, and 2 dashes of orange bitters with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

name: Hiroshima
instructions: Layer Sambuca, then Absinthe, then Irish cream liqueur, and finish with a drizzle of grenadine in a shot glass.

name: Hocus Pocus
instructions: Combine vodka, melon liqueur, blue curaçao, sweet & sour, and pineapple juice in a shaker with ice, then strain into a glass. Add a piece of dry ice for a smoky effect.

name: Holloween Punch
instructions: In a punch bowl, combine grape juice and your choice of carbonated soft drink. Add scoops of orange and lime sherbet, allowing them to float and partially melt, creating a bubbly, swirling effect on top.

name: Homemade Blackberry Lemonade
instructions: Muddle blackberries and sugar in a bowl, then combine with water and lemon juice. Stir until sugar dissolves, strain into a glass filled with ice, and top with remaining water.

name: Homemade Kahlua
instructions: Dissolve 2 1/2 cups of sugar in 2 cups of boiling water, then mix in 1 cup of corn syrup. In the remaining 1 cup of boiling water, dissolve 1 1/2 oz of instant coffee. Combine the syrup and coffee in a gallon jug, let it cool, then add 1 fifth of vodka and 2 oz of vanilla extract. For optimal flavor, allow the mixture to mature for 4-5 weeks.

name: Honey Bee
instructions: Shake white rum, honey, and lemon juice with crushed ice, then strain into a margarita glass.

name: Honey Bee Mine

ingredients.name: Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum

instructions: Combine Bacardi Carta Blanca, orange blossom honey, and vanilla extract in a shaker with ice, then strain into a flute and top with Brut Champagne.

name: Honey Carrot Juice
instructions: Juice fresh carrots and combine with honey and sugar, then mix in water until well blended. Serve chilled.

name: Honey Egg Juice
instructions: Combine egg yolk, milk, lemon juice, orange juice, honey, and Calpis in a shaker with ice, then shake well and strain into a chilled glass.

name: Honey Spearmint Tea
instructions: Brew spearmint tea and stir in honey until fully dissolved. Serve hot.

name: Horchata
instructions: Blend tiger nuts with cold water until smooth, then strain into a mixing glass. Stir in cinnamon powder, lemon zest, and white sugar until dissolved, then add gin and mix. Serve over ice.

name: Horchata Water
instructions: Blend white rice with water until smooth, then strain to remove solids. Mix the rice water with condensed milk, evaporated milk, vanilla extract, and sugar to taste. Serve over ice and garnish with cinnamon sticks.

name: Horse's Neck
instructions: In a highball glass filled with ice, combine 2 oz brandy and 5 oz ginger ale, then stir gently. Add 2 dashes of bitters if desired, and garnish with a long strip of lemon peel.

name: Hot Buttered Rum
instructions: In a warm mug, combine butter, sugar, confectioners sugar, and vanilla ice cream, then stir until smooth. Add rum and top with boiling water, mixing well. Sprinkle with ground cinnamon and nutmeg before serving.

name: Hot Chocolate to Die for
instructions: Melt the chocolate, butter, and vanilla in a double boiler until smooth, then stir in the half-and-half. Pour into a coffee mug and top with mini marshmallows.

name: Hot Creamy Bush
instructions: Combine 1 shot of Irish whiskey, 3/4 shot of Baileys Irish cream, and 6 oz of hot coffee in an Irish coffee cup.

name: Hot Espresso
instructions: Brew coffee using water and coffee beans, then serve hot.

name: Hot Toddy
instructions: Whisk together 50 ml whiskey and 15 ml honey, dividing the mixture between two heatproof glasses. Add half a cinnamon stick to each, then fill with 200 ml boiling water. Incorporate a splash of lemon juice to taste, garnish with a lemon slice studded with a clove, and serve immediately.

name: Hot Water
instructions: Heat water until steaming, then pour into a suitable vessel and serve immediately.

name: Hugo
instructions: In a glass filled with ice cubes, combine Prosecco, elderflower syrup, and soda water. Squeeze in fresh lime juice and gently stir. Garnish with mint leaves.

name: Hunter's Moon
instructions: Muddle blackberries with sugar syrup in a shaker, then add vermouth and maraschino cherry with ice and shake well. Fine strain into a balloon glass, top with lemonade, and serve.

name: Hurricane
instructions: Combine white rum, navy rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice, passion fruit syrup, and cordial lemon in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

name: Ice Cold Water
instructions: Fill a glass with ice, then pour in cold water to the desired level.
